certificateDescription: Earned the Magna Cum Laude distinction for outstanding academic achievement and commitment to excellence in Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at Quezon City University.
Completed the Postman API Fundamentals course, demonstrating basic proficiency in using Postman for API testing.

Certified in English for IT 1 by Cisco and OpenEDG. Proficient in IT-specific grammar, information security, job roles, customer support phrases, and vocabulary related to user experience, fraudulent calls, and network/software engineering.
